description: book-shaped flask with yellow hearts, yellow edges (top, side and bottom) and yellow straps on side between hearts; blue star with floral and foliate designs at center on "cover"; spine inscribed "Pars Hiemadis as usum D'ni Thomas Cannonicy B ae mariae de' Salensis 1708"
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on spine, in blue: [·Pars·/ Hiemadis·/·ad· usum·/ ·D\'ni·/ Canonicy·/ B·æ Mariae·/ De\'/ Salensis·/ 1708·]
markings: on bottom, on label: [23D]; on bottom: collector\'s label; on bottom, black sticker with gold from DM&P Manheim Antiques, New York City
title: Flask
